title: Toggle Class of HTML Element
description: In this lab, we will be delving into the world of JavaScript programming. The purpose of this lab is to provide hands-on experience with the toggleClass function, which allows you to toggle a class for an HTML element. By the end of this lab, you will have a thorough understanding of how to use this function to manipulate the styling of HTML elements using JavaScript.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
